alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 12:18AM CDT until June 26 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in south central Mississippi... Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1217 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sandersville to Ellisville to near Sanford to near Society Hill, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rawls Springs around 1225 AM CDT. West Hattiesburg and Oak Grove around 1230 AM CDT. Petal, Sunrise and Macedonia around 1235 AM CDT. Hattiesburg, Pine Ridge and McLaurin around 1245 AM CDT. Purvis around 1250 AM CDT. Rock Hill around 100 AM CDT. Brooklyn around 105 AM CDT. Maxie around 110 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
